content: ohje on tarkoitettu onteloneuloksen kokeilemiseen lankavalinnasta riippuu minkä kokoinen lappusesta tulee puikot valitaan langan mukaan suositeltavaa valita kokeiluun ensin pienempi puikkokoko onteloneuloksen kokeilemiseen sopii villalanka paremmin kuin puuvilla puuvilla on kuitenkin patalappuun villaa parempi materiaali *this is very easy chart for trying out doubleknitting however the potholder can also double as game mat for tic-tac-toe * *any thickness yarn can be used choose the needle size according to yarn finished size depends on the yarn bulky yarn makes appr 6 square * *wool is easier to work with but cotton is more suitable for a potholder *
